AboutMeTexts: My name is Pisit Akarateerapisal, you can call me "Bank".
I am computer engineer who enjoy solving problem and learning new thing. Such as
My specialize is coding. namely C, C#, javascript and more language that I have experience with. I also good at calculating too.

I'm also capable in english literacy. My interested in learning thing that I like and find source of knowledge from many source make me learn from international source and make me learn english in one go.

I also like creative thinking too. I like to look at the idea that I interested and think "If I can change it, what would I do?" and it's always fun to imagine how much the idea could be expanded and it improve my thinking skill too
When I'm not working, I like
🏃 go out for a walk and exercise
